snippet.title: Flat Trip Trailer
snippet.description:
Flat Trip is a small platformer adventure, set in the doodly world of Flat Land – the weirdest place of all. Simple gameplay mechanics with challenging gameplay moments, interesting looking graphics and an awesome soundtrack – those are the core features of this game. 

Available on Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/918740/Flat_Trip/
Complete soundtrack:
iTunes: https://apple.co/2y4Nxmq
Spotify: https://bit.ly/2BYajzc
Яндекс.Музыка: https://bit.ly/2pJXmlv
Google.Play: https://tinyurl.com/ydexz9bq
Bandcamp: https://bit.ly/2QuimYw
